about_the_game:
Soul exploration notes - the new year beast of resentment · national rhyme art lion Awakening (49999 spirit coins attached) DLC includes the new year beast of resentment · national rhyme art lion awakening clothing, 49999 spirit coins attached with the skin.



"The sleeping lion wakes up in the East, and the gongs and drums celebrate the new year."



Lion awakening is a traditional Chinese folk culture which integrates martial arts, dance, music and so on. It is considered as a auspicious thing to drive away evil spirits and avoid harm. Every time there is a festival or a major event, there must be a lion wake-up, lasting prosperity, passed down from generation to generation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
